Find Your Councilmember
=======================

Who's My Member?

Enter your address in the top right hand corner to see which district you live in.
[The Mayor (Place One)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_one_mayor/index.php)
serves as representative for the whole city.
